summary: PTT Star app: enhance IAX/DVSwitch-style connection settings UI (host/port/username/password/callsign/node) with explicit phone-to-IAX mode and selectable codec types.
architectural_notes: IAX configuration UX should support explicit credential fields (including username) and codec negotiation/selection (ulaw/slin/adpcm).

existing_features.title: Update the IAX / DVSwitch configuration form UI to use a DVSwitch-style field order and labeling: Hostname, Port, Username, Password, Callsign, Node Number.
Add a "Phone to IAX connection" checkbox to the IAX / DVSwitch configuration and require it to be checked before allowing the user to save the IAX / DVSwitch configuration.

Add a "Codec Types" selection control to the IAX / DVSwitch configuration (presented as a tab or clearly labeled segmented option) with allowed values: ulaw, slin, adpcm, and persist the selected codec with the saved IAX / DVSwitch connection.
Extend the IAX / DVSwitch saved-configuration display to include the new "Phone to IAX connection" state and the selected codec type, while continuing to mask passwords.

Update the connection settings storage/types used by the frontend so the IAX / DVSwitch connection can persist (a) phone-to-IAX confirmation and (b) codec type without breaking existing saved sessions.

new_feature_requests.summary: Redesign IAX settings form to match DVSwitch layout: hostname, port, username, password, callsign, node number.
Add 'Phone to IAX connection' checkbox to explicitly indicate/enable phone-to-IAX mode.
Add 'Codec Types' server-selection tab/option with choices: ulaw, slin, adpcm.

projectName: Redesign IAX/DVSwitch settings to match DVSwitch layout with codec selection and phone-to-IAX confirmation
